abstract: Location based services on smartphones, like Foursquare, are largely ignored by adult users.
snippet: Location based services on smartphones, like Foursquare, are largely ignored by adult users.
lead_paragraph: So-called location services like Foursquare or Gowalla seem ubiquitous. These services use a smartphone, often GPS-equipped, to broadcast the user’s location, find friends nearby, and pick up deals or information linked to the location. In August, Facebook introduced its own location service, Places.

headline.main: Adults Are Not So Inclined to Check In
headline.print_headline: Adults Are Not So Inclined to Check In
